body: You enhance a creature's ability to harm an opponent based on the number of times it has already injured that opponent with a natural attack. Each time the creature successfully strikes an opponent with a natural attack, the subject gains a cumulative +1 bonus on damage rolls made against that opponent when making natural attacks (maximum +5 bonus). If an attack misses, the bonus to damage for all attacks resets to +0.
description: +1 on damage rolls with each hit (max +5).

components.text: a handful of pebbles dropped one by one onto the ground

component_text: V, S, M (a handful of pebbles dropped one by one onto the ground)
name: Natural Rhythm
